Bash("c:\\dev\\AMS-Ceo\\tmp_check_aircraft.js" << 'SCRIPT_EOF'
const fs = require\('fs'\);
const content = fs.readFileSync\('src/scripts/seedHistoricalAircraft.js', 'utf8'\);

// Extract all [manufacturer, model, variant] from seed file
const entries = [];
const re = /manufacturer:\\s*'\([^']+\)',\\s*model:\\s*'\([^']+\)',\\s*variant:\\s*\(?:'\([^']+\)'|null\)/g;
let m;
while \(m = re.exec\(content\)\) {
  entries.push\({ mfr: m[1], model: m[2], variant: m[3] || null }\);
}

function find\(mfr, model, variant\) {
  return entries.some\(e => e.mfr === mfr && e.model === model && e.variant === variant\);
}

const wanted = [
  ['Douglas','DC-3',null], ['Douglas','DC-4',null], ['Douglas','DC-6',null], ['Douglas','DC-7',null],
  ['Lockheed','L-1049','Super Constellation'], ['Lockheed','L-188','Electra'],
  ['Convair','240',null], ['Convair','340',null], ['Convair','440',null], ['Convair','580',null],
  ['Martin','4-0-4',null], ['Vickers','Viscount','700'], ['Vickers','Viscount','800'],
  ['Handley Page','HPR.7','Herald'], ['NAMC','YS-11',null],
  ['Fairchild','F-27',null], ['Fokker','F27','Friendship'], ['Fokker','50',null], ['Fokker','60',null],
  ['Nord','262',null], ['GAF','N22','Nomad'], ['CASA','C-212','Aviocar'],
  ['Shorts','SC.7','Skyvan'], ['Shorts','330',null], ['Shorts','360',null],
  ['Beechcraft','99','Airliner'], ['Beechcraft','1900','Airliner'], ['Raytheon','Beech 1900D',null],
  ['British Aerospace','Jetstream','31'], ['British Aerospace','Jetstream','32'], ['British Aerospace','Jetstream','41'],
  ['Saab','340','A'], ['Saab','340','B'], ['Saab','2000',null],
  ['ATR','42','300'], ['ATR','42','320'], ['ATR','42','400'], ['ATR','42','500'], ['ATR','42','600'],
  ['ATR','72','200'], ['ATR','72','202'], ['ATR','72','500'], ['ATR','72','600'],
  ['de Havilland Canada','DHC-6','Twin Otter'], ['Viking Air','DHC-6','Twin Otter Series 400'],
  ['Viking Air','DHC-6','Twin Otter Guardian'], ['de Havilland Canada','DHC-7','Dash 7'],
  ['de Havilland Canada','DHC-8','Dash 8-100'], ['de Havilland Canada','DHC-8','Dash 8-200'],
  ['de Havilland Canada','DHC-8','Dash 8-300'], ['de Havilland Canada','DHC-8','Dash 8-400'],
  ['Bombardier','Q400','NextGen'],
  ['Embraer','EMB 110','Bandeirante'], ['Embraer','EMB 120','Brasilia'],
  ['Fairchild','Metro','II'], ['Fairchild','Metro','III'], ['Swearingen','SA-227','Metro'],
  ['Let','L-410','Turbolet'], ['Harbin','Y-12',null],
  ['Dornier','228',null], ['Dornier','328','Turboprop'], ['Dornier','328','JET'],
  ['Pilatus','PC-6','Porter'], ['Pilatus','PC-12',null], ['Pilatus','PC-24',null],
  ['Daher','TBM 940',null], ['Quest','Kodiak','100'],
  ['GippsAero','GA8','Airvan'], ['Pacific Aerospace','PAC 750XL',null],
  ['Tecnam','P2012','Traveller'], ['Reims-Cessna','F406','Caravan II'],
  ['Cessna','208','Caravan'], ['Cessna','208B','Grand Caravan'], ['Cessna','408','SkyCourier'],
  ['Cessna','441','Conquest II'], ['Textron','Cessna 182','Skylane'],
  ['Piper','PA-31','Navajo Chieftain'], ['Piper','PA-42','Cheyenne III'], ['Piper','PA-46','M600'],
  ['Partenavia','P.68','Observer'], ['Diamond','DA62',null],
  ['Antonov','An-2',null], ['Antonov','An-24',null], ['Antonov','An-140',null],

  ['Tupolev','Tu-154',null], ['Tupolev','Tu-154','M'], ['Tupolev','Tu-204',null],
  ['Ilyushin','Il-14',null], ['Ilyushin','Il-18',null], ['Ilyushin','Il-62',null],
  ['Ilyushin','Il-76','TD'], ['Ilyushin','Il-86',null],

  ['Airbus','A300','B2'], ['Airbus','A300','B4'], ['Airbus','A300','600'],
  ['Airbus','A310','200'], ['Airbus','A310','300'],
  ['Airbus','A318',null], ['Airbus','A319',null],
  ['Airbus','A320','100'], ['Airbus','A320','200'], ['Airbus','A320','neo'],

  ['Boeing','757','200'], ['Boeing','757','300'],
  ['Boeing','767','200'], ['Boeing','767','300'], ['Boeing','767','300ER'], ['Boeing','767','400ER'],
  ['Airbus','A330','200'], ['Airbus','A330','200F'], ['Airbus','A330','300'],
  ['Airbus','A330','800'], ['Airbus','A330','900'],

  ['Boeing','777','8X'], ['Boeing','777','9X'], ['Boeing','777','F'],
  ['Boeing','787','8'], ['Boeing','787','9'], ['Boeing','787','10'],
  ['Airbus','A350','800'], ['Airbus','A350','900'], ['Airbus','A350','1000'],
  ['Boeing','747','100'], ['Boeing','747','200'], ['Boeing','747','300'],
  ['Boeing','747','400'], ['Boeing','747','8'], ['Boeing','747','8F'],
  ['McDonnell Douglas','DC-10','10'], ['McDonnell Douglas','DC-10','30'],
  ['McDonnell Douglas','MD-11',null], ['McDonnell Douglas','MD-11','F'],
  ['Lockheed','L-1011','TriStar'], ['Ilyushin','Il-96','400'],
  ['Airbus','A380','800'], ['Aerospatiale-BAC','Concorde',null],
];

let missing = 0;
for \(const [mfr, model, variant] of wanted\) {
  if \(!find\(mfr, model, variant\)\) {
    const name = `${mfr} ${model}${variant ? ' ' + variant : ''}`;
    console.log\('MISSING: ' + name\);
    missing++;
  }
}

console.log\('\\n--- Summary ---'\);
console.log\('Wanted: ' + wanted.length\);
console.log\('Found: ' + \(wanted.length - missing\)\);
console.log\('Missing: ' + missing\);
console.log\('Total in seed file: ' + entries.length\);
SCRIPT_EOF)
